name: Space Invaders (itch) (WorldHatter)
description:
I tried to make it look like the old one. The main difference are the particle explosions.

Controls

Use the right and left arrow keys or A and W keys to move the laser cannon. Use space, W, S, up / down arrow key or left mouse click to shoot.

If you have any suggestions, don't hesitate to comment! I hope you have fun playing it!
